org.jgrapes.portal.base

Interface Portal.PortalSummaryMXBean

  • Enclosing class:
    Portal

    public static interface Portal.PortalSummaryMXBean

    An MBean interface for getting information about all portals.

    There is currently no summary information. However, the (periodic) invocation of getPortals() ensures that entries for removed Portals are unregistered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • getPortals
